metadata.title: Fleeting Reminiscence
metadata.author: Gemini
metadata.summary: A profound meditation on the nature of memory and the passing of time through the lens of falling snow, as the narrator reflects on a lost love and comes to terms with the beauty of impermanence.
metadata.summaryJapanese: 降り積もる雪を通じ、記憶の本質と時の流れを深く思索する文学的な物語。失われた恋の追憶と、無常の美への理解を描く。
